SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_lsc_customer (c_name, c_areaid, c_addr, c_tele, c_fax, c_zip, c_gcode, c_corporation, c_contacter, c_mphone, c_sale, i_status ) values (#{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cAreaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cGcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cMphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update t_lsc_customer set c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_areaid = #{cAreaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_addr = #{cAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_tele = #{cTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_fax = #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_zip = #{cZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_gcode = #{cGcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_corporation = #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_contacter = #{cContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_mphone = #{cMphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_sale = #{cSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i_status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select c_id, c_name, c_areaid, c_addr, c_tele, c_fax, c_zip, c_gcode, c_corporation, c_contacter, c_mphone, c_sale, i_status from t_lsc_customer where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
